name: Improvisational Babysitting
description:
A submission to InkJam 2021: You'll Think of Something

You're settling in for a nice relaxing Saturday when your sister shows up. She needs someone to watch your niece, and you agree to do it. But what are you supposed to do with a four year old for an hour, in a totally boring apartment with no toys? 

Don't worry, I'm sure you'll think of something.
